channel.title: Doubling/tripling money
channel.description: What the hell? Seriously Jagex should not have hyped free trade up. EVERYONE is taking advantage of the opportunity to scam.

item.title: Doubling/tripling money
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I know that, but on moparscape theres still people who are oblivious.

Read full topic

item.title: Doubling/tripling money
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

yea because 17gp - 6k is reasonable in a day for one clan, what were they doing, buying ALL bronze arrows at 100k each? even then it is farfetched as they would get the best offer currently in the GE, they would need a huge merch clan to pull it off, I dont think it exists.

Read full topic

item.title: Doubling/tripling money
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

you would have thought jagex would have checks to see if the price changes by a number such as 50% of its last price in a small amount of time and disallow the change until verified by someone.

Read full topic

item.title: Doubling/tripling money
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Moparisthebest:

They just need to automatically ban anyone who says ‘no scam’ in a sentence. This may be shocking to some of you, but if someone says ‘no scam’ it’s 100% guaranteed to be a scam!

Nah I advertised a dice game where whatever number i roll I x it by 100 and payout. I gathered a few people and they all said I was scamming, probably got reported a few times. Anyhow I rolled a 55 on a guy and payed him 5500 gp. A player moderator was watching me. I told him to gtfo hes an idiot and doesnt run this game. Wasnt reported for offensive language either

[quote=“cumescape, post:28, topic:384554”][quote author=maniown link=topic=480317.msg3516942#msg3516942 date=1299073261]
I double money IRL all day. Make epic bank at school, wait until a few kids give me 5$ and then I tele varrock.
[/quote]I just used to sell handmade cigarettes to the “bad” kids. Make like $1 a piece on them and walk home with $20.[/quote]

Doing this for warped tour, $1 a cig gonna be irl rich.

Read full topic

item.title: Doubling/tripling money
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:26, topic:384554”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=480317.msg3516459#msg3516459 date=1299030879]
i dont see why scamming should be against the rules. its the victims fault for being so oblivious
[/quote]

This is how it works in Eve Online. Scamming done purely within game (getting someone to give you ISK, getting someone to let you sit in their ship, getting someone to give you corp powers by coercion or lying or w/e and then stealing their corps shit) is perfectly legal and CCP won’t do anything. Only “out of game” stuff is against the rules (keylogging passes etc).

Justification being “space is a nasty place”.

Apparently RS is happy town ;)[/quote]As should all MMORPGs be (and they used to be, until the casuals got their say and ruined it)

Read full topic

Only “out of game” stuff is against the rules (keylogging passes etc).

Justification being “space is a nasty place”.

Apparently RS is happy town

item.title: Doubling/tripling money

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:15, topic:384554”]THERE ARE IRL THIEVES AS WELL![/quote]And if they get caught they go to jail. Honestly. And people that take advantage of others (for example, old people scams) also go to jail. Just because the person was oblivious doesn’t mean it’s OK to do.
